mapper.select: SELECT code,post_date,post_content,post_title ,date_format(post_date,'%Y') as date_year ,date_format(post_date,'%b') as date_month ,date_format(post_date,'%e') as date_day FROM gh_posts WHERE post_status='publish' order by post_date desc limit 0,88
SELECT * FROM gh_posts order by ID desc limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
SELECT code,post_title FROM gh_posts WHERE code > #{code} ORDER BY code limit 0,1
SELECT code,post_title FROM gh_posts WHERE code < #{code} ORDER BY code desc LIMIT 0,1
